column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|

|PoE Switch|TC-P3S06|·4*10/100/1000M PoE 端口+2*1000M SFP 端口
·符合 IEEE 802.3、IEEE 802.3u、IEEE802.3ab、IEEE802.3z 标准
·以太网端口 10/100/1000M 速率自适应
·兼容 IEEE802.3af（15.4w）、IEEE802.3at（30W）
·端口 1 支持 BT 40W
·流控模式：全双工采用 IEEE 802.3x 标准，半双工采用背压标准
·支持端口自动翻转（Auto MDI/MDIX）
·面板指示灯监控工作状态，帮助故障分析
·一键智能切换，支持 VLAN、默认、扩展|

column2: IEEE802.3af (15.4W)  IEEE802.3at (30W)  POE port output voltage: DC 52V  POE power supply core: 1/2+; 3/6
10BASE-T: Cat 3、4、5 UTP (≤100 meter)  100BASE-TX: Cat5 or more UTP (≤100 meter)  1000Base-TX: Cat5 or more UTP/STP (≤100 meter)
On: Powered on  Off: Powered off
Dual color light selection: default green (link data), switch yellow light (POE)
Port isolation mode. In this mode, the PoE ports (1-4) of the switch cannot communicate with each other and can only communicate with the UP-link port.
Normal mode, all port can communicate with each other, the transmission distance is within 100 meters, the transmission rate is 10M / 100/1000M adaptive;
Link extension mode, 3-4 ports PoE power supply and data transmission distance can be extended to 220 meters, the transmission rate becomes 10M
Working Temperature: -10~50°C  Storage Temperature: -40~70°C  Working Humidity:10%~90%, non-condensing  Storage Temperature:5%~95%, non-condensing
Product Dimension: 200*118*44.5mm  Package Dimension: 245*190*60mm  N.W:0.67kg  G.W:0.97kg
Carton MEAS:520*320*400mm  Packing Qty:20 units  Packing Weight:20.4KG
Input Voltage: AC 100-240 V  Power supply:52V /1.25A
Product power: maximum 5W  POE power: maximum 60W
